@JuicyLucy @DanielPink short term monetary reward or the long term benefit if being surrounded by people who are aligned and driving towards the same mission, vision and values as they are. Again, just my POV! :)

@JuicyLucy @DanielPink s/he can bring in people who are aligned to the mission of the company as s/he is intrinsically motivated towards also, tor he utilisation of a reward (the referral bonus) might not drive the result you want. For me, it's a question of what more valuable to the employee, the

@JuicyLucy @DanielPink Hum....good question....IMO, it depends on the employee's perception of the referral program.
